value:
I am told that this is traditional Hatari
festival garb. It does not offer much
protection, but it is easy to fight in.

This festival would be a good chance
to test myself against Karel without
either of us losing our lives...

Even while wielding another weapon,
the spirit of the sword burns within
my soul. It is my constant companion.

Do not expect me to go easy on you
just because this is a festival. If you
wish to test me, bring your very best.

They say Hatari was isolated from
the rest of the world for years, like
I was isolated from my tribe.

I am Karla. Know that the passion of
the Hatari festival is alive and well at
$Nf's castle.

It will take opponents far stronger
than this to make me flinch!

I think I have gotten over my initial
unfamiliarity with this garb. Now I can
really cut loose.

How could I let this happen... Did I
lose myself in the festivities again?

This festival has something to teach
all of us, it seems.

I am Karla. My expertise lies in blades,
but I hope to learn more about how
Hatari warriors fight with a lance.

I have not yet thanked you for inviting
me to this festival of warriors, have I?$k$pMy sole purpose in life has been to
become skilled enough with the blade
to surpass my brother.$k$pEven knowing that it would force me
to either take my opponent's life, or
lose my own...I fought to surpass him.$k$pI did not think highly of those who
would risk their lives in an arena for
a chance at fame and fortune.$k$pBut what drives this festival is
different: not glory, but passion.
Not vanity, but pride.$k$pI am thankful for each and every one
of my opponents. I will not forget
this experience for as long as I live.
やっ
ていっ
くっ…！
手強い…
I will not hold back.
Do me the honor.
One step closer...
Show me your strength.
It was beyond my skills...
Hehe...
Thank you for inviting me to the festival.
*sigh* To think I would wear something like this... I must have lost myself in the festivities.
Queen Nailah's skills are impressive. Exactly what I look for in an opponent.
I may be unaccustomed to this weapon, but I will not need excuses.
I have seen many festivals in my travels, but...none as lively as this.
This festival is filled with many skilled participants... Will my brother be drawn here as well?
I am glad you think this suits me, but...for some reason, I feel a little embarrassed hearing you say it.
I must set an example.
Where to?
As you see fit.
